content: designed by tamara adams a crocheted worsted weight rendition of a partial solar eclipse solar eclipse fun facts during a total eclipse the earth s crust bulges upwards and you will be 40 mm 1 57 closer to the sun you will weigh 1 7 oz 11 lb lighter source nasa beginner + simple stitch patterns and/or shaping size 5 13 cm at widest part / moon = 4 10 cm materials 1 coaster yarn lily sugar n cream cotton worsted weight 4 black 13 yds 12 m yellow sunshine 9 yds 8 m orange hot orange 6 yds 5 5 m hooks g 4 0 mm h 5 0 mm other yarn needle gauge first 2 rounds = 2 abbreviations beg beginning round s round s bl back loop st s stitch es chain chain single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet skip skip half_double_crochet half_double_crochet slip_stitch s slip_stitch es lp s loop s yo yarn over tamara adams ©2017 http //www ravelry com/designers/tamara-adams solar eclipse coasters page 1 of 3 stitch explanation decrease double_crochet 2 sts together yarn over yo hook insert hook in first st indicated pull up a loop 3 loops on hook yo hook pull through 2 loops yo hook insert in next st indicated pull up a loop 4 loops on hook yo pull through 2 loops 3 loops on hook yo pull through last 3 loops one decrease made hdc2tog half_double_crochet 2 sts together yarn over yo hook insert hook in first st indicated pull up a lp 3 lps on hook insert hook in next st indicated pull up a lp 4 lps on hook yo hook pull through all 4 lps on hook one hdc2tog made picot chain 2 slip_stitch in 2nd chain fr hook picot made tip to get the points on the sun s rays as shown in the picture make the slip_stitch in 2 lps of 2nd chain fr hook instead of just one magic_ring also known as magic adjustable loop video tutorial at easiest crochet magic_ring instructions american terms are used throughout usa to uk stitch conversions http //www yarnfwd com/main/crochet html moon notes if piece is too large use smaller hook and/or crochet round 2 with half_double_crochet instead of double_crochet the beg chain-2 is not counted as a stitch it is to act as a filler so there is not a gap as there would be if just beginning the round with a chain-3 double_crochet likewise the joining slip_stitch is not to be counted as a st but will be worked into at the end of the round this also acts to complete filling in any gap to make a solid piece work over yarn tails whenever possible to avoid having to weave in so many ends tamara adams ©2017 http //www ravelry com/designers/tamara-adams solar eclipse coasters page 2 of 3 use hook g 4 0 mm round 1 with black chain 2 in magic_ring beg chain-2 does not count as a st throughout moon 12 double_crochet in ring
